description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler with virtual methods for handling various OCI container events, such as start, stop, failure, and state change, along with required includes and namespace declarations.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface for handling OCI container lifecycle events, requiring implementing classes to define specific responses to container start, stop, failure, and state change events.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container has started.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container has stopped.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container encounters a failure.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Handles the event when an OCI container's state changes.
